Field.name: Programs
Field.Description: Programs are sets of instructions that tell a computer how to perform specific tasks, enabling functionality in various software applications.

Field.name: Cybersecurity
Field.Description: Cybersecurity focuses on protecting software systems, networks, and data from cyber threats, ensuring the integrity and confidentiality of information.

Field.name: Documentation
Field.Description: Documentation provides essential information and guides for using and understanding software applications, helping users navigate and troubleshoot programs.

Field.name: SoftwareDevelopment
Field.Description: Software development involves creating, designing, and maintaining software applications to meet the needs of users and businesses.
